review: very easy to set up and use
author: sandra  wilson

review: Decent companion to the chromecast booth have there worth.
author: Miket77

review: It works Great!! I have the Fire Tv and wanted this so I can take it with me when I go and it fits the bill to a T...
author: D. Goosman "Darlene Goosman"

review: My first Fire Stick  worked for a few months and would not reconnect,  so I ordered another one. It did not connect at all.  Tried Two other TV' s. Still did not work.  Then brought  a new Router, top of the line for 2015.  The Fire Sticks still will not work.  Went to Roku2.  Works just great.
author: Sandra Chambers-Rohling

review: Virtually no instructions with it.  Still haven't been able to figure out how to connect to my Netflix account through which I have video streaming.  There is a huge delay when using the remote.  Sometimes it take 15-20 seconds before a change on the screen occurs.  Wish I would have gone with a Roku.
author: Howard O Ward

review: Mine freezes all the time and sometimes even cuts off I also feel like the remote is unresponsive a lot of the time kinda horrible if you ask me
author: zach

review: Set up was very intuitive. The wifi setup worked immediately. Browsing and selecting movies is also easy. I have not tried it in a hotel yet.
author: Josef
